title: "Coronavirus masks are thwarting facial recognition systems. So, of course, people are building training sets from your lockdown-wear selfies"
excerpt: "Face masks are a common sight right now, depending on where you live, as people slip them on to curb the spread of the COVID-19 coronavirus. That's a problem for facial-recognition systems, which struggle to identify people with most of their faces obscured."
